name: Omatunto (IAPSOP)
content:
Omatunto (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: Omatunto Summary:  From Pat Deveney's database: Omatunto ("Conscience"). Teosofinen Aikakauslehti ("Theosophical Magazine”). 1905 Monthly Helsinki, Finland. Language: Finnish. Editor: Pekka Ervast, Maria Ramstedt. 1/1, January 1905. This was intended to be a Theosophical journal but seems to have been short-lived or to have never gotten off the ground: Ervast (1875-1934) was simultaneously at the beginning of 1905 involved with publishing Tietaja and also Ruusu-Risti. He was a writer, editor and clairvoyant and had joined the Swedish branch of the Theosophical Society and then in 1907 started the Finnish branch. Issues:Omatunto V1 N1 Jan 1905
